reqs:
NOTE: You must also sign up for a discussion section: D11 or D12. If this section if FULL or BLOCKED please sign up for Section 002 in Term 2 or for the corresponding wait list section - THTR 120, Section WL1. Once you have registered in the wait list there is no need to contact the Department. Your registration will be switched to the parent section when space becomes available. Preference may be given to Majors, Minors, or Honours students in Theatre or Film. For more information about Department of Theatre and Film wait lists please visit: http://theatrefilm.ubc.ca/undergraduate/undergraduate-courses/how-to-wait-list-a-course/

description: Theory and practice of the theatrical arts. Attendance at plays is required.
